div.p: We held our annual "I Love to Read Week" during the week before April break!
Make sure to place an order before it's too late! Yearbooks are $20 each.
Join us for a virtual spirit week starting on Monday, April 20th!
Students in Mr. Legris' class have been raising trout for the past few months. We released them on April 8th!
How many jellybeans are in the jar?

div.p: Good Day, Lamoille North Friends and Families: Lamoille North Supervisory Union is complying with the order of Governor Phil Scott for continuity of education and have changed our platform to ….Continue reading
Dear CES Families, Congratulations! You, your children, and our staff have made it to this point of a much needed and well deserved vacation. I am in awe of everything ….Continue reading

div.div: Due to COVID 19, schools in Vermont will be dismissed for the remainder of the school year. For more information, visit https://www.cesvt.net/update-from-superintendent-gallagher-3-29-2020/

Join us for a virtual CES Spirit Week during the Week of April 20th! Monday: Sports Day Tuesday: Vermont Day (tye-dye and flannel) Wednesday: Wacky Tacky (clashing patterns and crazy hair) Thursday: Comfy PJ Day Friday: School Spirit Day
Weekly early release at 11:00am for teacher professional development.
Due to COVID 19, schools in Vermont will be dismissed for the remainder of the school year. For more information, visit https://www.cesvt.net/update-from-superintendent-gallagher-3-29-2020/
For more information, and link to order, please visit https://www.cesvt.net/2020-yearbook-information/

div.p: While schools are closed, we will be providing free meals to all children age 18 and under.
Lamoille North is monitoring the rapid developments of the COVID-19 (Coronavirus) and responding to it's arrival in Vermont.
We've compiled a list of resources and information for our families that do not have reliable internet access at home
We are loaning school-owned devices (Chromebooks, iPads) to students who need them to successfully accomplish their remote learning.
